Summary: multiple wittnesses saw 15 of these flying over our lake immediately after firework display.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in West Bloomfield Township
There were no other sightings in West Bloomfield Township on or around July 4th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching the fireworks at our Lake in Michigan,on July 4 2010...immediately after the fireworks STOPPED...We saw approximately 15 of these objects flying in formation,from the south of the lake...they were flying in formation...too slow to be planes and too fast to be balloons...they flew right over us,and everybody was saying..."what the heck is that"...they looked like giant jackolanterns lit up inside...We took several photos of the formation,but only ONE turned out!!!We have multiple witneses.
